docblock.description: Controller for the EmailRecords functionality, allows authorized users to view the emails that have been sent to a member.
docblock.long-description: Add your application-wide methods in the class below, your controllers will inherit them.

docblock.description: Views rendered from this controller will have access to the following helpers.
Test to see if a user is authorized to make a request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Member record for the user.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The request the user is attempting to make.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if the user is authorized to make the request, otherwise false.

docblock.description: Given a list of e-mails, set the memberNames and emails vars on the view.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of e-mail record data.

docblock.description: Display a list of all e-mails for all members.
Display a list of all e-mails for a specific member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Show all e-mails sent to this member.

docblock.description: Controller to handle Member functionality, allows members to be viewed, edited, and registered.
docblock.long-description: Add your application-wide methods in the class below, your controllers will inherit them.

docblock.description: Views rendered from this controller will have access to the following helpers.
The list of components this Controller relies on.
Test to see if a user is authorized to make a request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Member record for the user.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The request the user is attempting to make.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if the user is authorized to make the request, otherwise false.

docblock.description: Perform any actions that should be performed before any controller action.
Show a list of all Status and a count of how many members are in each status.
Show a list of all members, their e-mail address, status and the groups they're in.
List all members with a particular status.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The status to list all members for.

docblock.description: List all members who's name, email, username or handle is similar to the search term.
Perform all the actions needed to get a paginated member list with actions applied.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The query to pass to paginate(), usually obtained from a Member::getMemberSummary** method.

docblock.description: Get a MailingList model.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The MailingListModel.

docblock.description: Grab a users e-mail address and start the membership procedure.
Set the session flash message based on the data returned from a function that updates the mailing list settings.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The message to show at the start of the flash, before any mailing list messages.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The results from the function that updated the mailing list settings.

docblock.description: Allow a member to set-up their initial login details.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member whose details we want to set-up.

docblock.description: Allow a member who is logged in to set-up their contact details.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member whose contact details we want to set-up.

docblock.description: Reject the contact details a member has supplied, with a message to say why.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member whose contact details we're rejecting.

docblock.description: Accept the contact details a member has supplied.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member whose contact details we're accepting.

docblock.description: Approve a membership and report back to the user.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member who we are approving.

docblock.description: Approve a membership.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member who we are approving.

docblock.description: Change a members password.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member whose password we are changing.

docblock.description: Generate or complete a forgot password request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the request, may be null.

docblock.description: Send the 'prospective member' email to a member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to send the message to.

docblock.description: Send the 'prospective member' email to a member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to send the message to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if e-mail was sent.

docblock.description: Send the 'contact details reminder' email to a member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to contact.

docblock.description: Send the 'so details reminder' email to a member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to contact.

docblock.description: Send the e-mail containing standing order info to a member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to send the reminder to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if mail was sent, false otherwise.

docblock.description: View the full member profile.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to view.

docblock.description: Allow editing of a member profile.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to view.

docblock.description: Revoke a members membership.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to revoke.

docblock.description: Reinstate an ex-members membership.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to reinstate.

docblock.description: Check to see if certain view/edit params should be shown to the logged in member.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member being viewed.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (out) If this is set to true then admin features should be shown.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (out) If this is set to true then financial information should be shown.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (out) If this is set to true then the member has joined.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (out) If this is set to true then show personal information about the member.

docblock.description: Send an e-mail to every member with a certain status.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Attempt to e-mail members with this status.

docblock.description: Attempt to login as a member.
Logout.
Adds the appropriate actions to each member in the member list.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A list of member summaries to add the actions to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The original memberList, with the actions added for each member.

docblock.description: Get an array of possible actions for a member

tag.name: param
tag.description: The id of the member to work with.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of actions.

docblock.description: Test to see if a request is coming from within the hackspace.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if the request is coming from with in the hackspace, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Get the ip address of the request.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The IP address of the request.

docblock.description: Upload a .csv file of bank transactions and look for members to approve.

tag.description: If set then look here in the session for a list of account id's to approve.

docblock.description: Get the key used to store members ids in the session after uploading a csv.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The key to be used in the session.
